----------------------------------------Â­Â­Â­Â­Â­Â­Â­Â­---------------------------------Â­-Â­-Â­-Â­-Â­-
Our motto on this channel is LAUGH DAILY! Why is this our motto? Because we believe in the importance of laughing daily, we strive to bring joy to people's lives by watching our content. 
"A joyful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones."  Proverbs 17:22  We love this verse and it is the driving force behind our videos and why we do what we do!

next.excerpt:
Brilliant. Bad. A little bit mad. May 2021.

Academy AwardÂ® winner Emma Stone (â€œLa La Landâ€) stars in Disneyâ€™s â€œCruella,â€ an all-new live-action feature film about the rebellious early days of one of cinemas most notorious â€“ and notoriously fashionable â€“ villains, the legendary Cruella de Vil. â€œCruella,â€ which is set in 1970s London amidst the punk rock revolution, follows a young grifter named Estella, a clever and creative girl determined to make a name for herself with her designs. She befriends a pair of young thieves who appreciate her appetite for mischief, and together they are able to build a life for themselves on the London streets. One day, Estellaâ€™s flair for fashion catches the eye of the Baroness von Hellman, a fashion legend who is devastatingly chic and terrifyingly haute, played by two-time OscarÂ® winner Emma Thompson (â€œHowards End,â€ â€œSense & Sensibilityâ€). But their relationship sets in motion a course of events and revelations that will cause Estella to embrace her wicked side and become the raucous, fashionable and revenge-bent Cruella.
Â 
Disneyâ€™s â€œCruellaâ€ is directed by Craig Gillespie (â€œI Tonyaâ€) from a screenplay by Dana Fox and Tony McNamara, story by Aline Brosh McKenna and Kelly Marcel & Steve Zissis. It was produced by Andrew Gunn (â€œFreaky Fridayâ€), Marc Platt (â€œMary Poppins Returnsâ€) and Kristin Burr (â€œChristopher Robinâ€), with Emma Stone, Michelle Wright, Jared LeBoff and Glenn Close serving as executive producers. Two-time OscarÂ®- winning costume designer Jenny Beavan (â€œMad Max: Fury Road,â€ â€œA Room with a Viewâ€) creates the dazzling and imaginative costumes, which take on a life of their own.

For more information on â€œCruella,â€ follow us on:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DisneyCruellaDeVil
Twitter:Â https://twitter.com/cruella
Instagram:Â https://www.instagram.com/disneycruella
YouTube:https://youtube.com/disneymovietrailersâ€‹
Hashtag: #Cruella
